content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:10 on a clear, dark night i was traveling westbound on interstate 10 near vidor texas. i looked through my windshield to observe any clouds or stars and saw 3 lights in a row aligned with the interstate. the distance between each light appeared to be the same. hard to guess, but approximately 300-400 yards apart. i stuck my head closer to the windshield and noticed a 4th light closer to my vehicle that was not visible when i was sitting back, also about 300-400 yards from the next closest. the lights were approximately 400-500 yards above the ground. the lights were bright white. each object/light actually consisted of 2 lights. difficult to explain, but imagine a football laying on it's side and well rounded, not pointed. there was a larger oval shaped white lite on the bottom, then a gap, then a smaller oval white light above it. no other colors were noticed. no blinking lights were noticed, and no sound was noticed. i will number the objects from closest to furthest with 1 being closest and 4 being furthest for this report. soon after initially observing the objects, object 2 moved closer to object 3 and appeared to go behind 3 then suddenly disappeared. shortly after that, 3 disappeared. 4 remained stable. i leaned forward to find 1 again and noticed that it was even with my drivers window. it remained there for a short while, but due to the fact that i was driving, i lost visual contact with it after a couple of minutes. during the time while i was driving and looking for 1, i lost contact with 4. after thinking that they were gone, i spotted a new light 5(same characteristics as 1-4) on my right. same height, but a greater distance from me, possibly 1000 yards. this object was moving west faster than i could keep up (the others 2-4 appeared to be at the same speed as me, and 1 appeared slower than me, i was traveling at 70mph). when i turned on highway 69 north in beaumont at 8:20, that moved the object behind me and i lost visual contact. i do not believe thess objects to be planes, helicopters, weather balloons, tower lights, flares or glare. i would be much obliged for an explanation of what i saw.
content.summary: 5 objects total. 3 moved. 3 disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Very bright light seen traveling from east to west from southwest florida international airport, in the south (naples area). the leading edge was very large and bright with a tail extending from the back.
from the size of the object i don't beleive it would have been possible for it not to hit somewhere (it couldn't have burned up completely.). color was white.
content.summary: Fireball in sky south of fort myers, florida

content.detailedDescription: I had just stepped outside to walk my dog when i looked north and saw a bright orange boomerang flash in the sky. my first thought was that it was sunlight reflecting off a aircraft.Then it dawned on me that i could not see any aircraft anywhere in the sky. i then began to walk to the back of the property when i saw one and then a second flash a little to the west of where i saw the first flash. these two flashes where white instead of orange. i watched for a few minutes but saw nothing else and went back to the dog walking thing. after several minutes i turned around and looked at the spot where i had seen the flashes and saw a large ball of light that i at first thought was a star. then it became clear this was not a star and was blinking. the blinking reminded me of a old rotating police light. the light was white and i could see flashes of blue or green in it. there was another smaller blinking light underneath and to the west of the larger light that was moving very slowly as if it were searching for something. i walked back to the house and continued to watch the lights and got my mom to come outside and look. she agreed that the lights were odd and did not look like any aircraft. we then went back inside and due to the cold and i came back out a few minutes later and the lights were gone. i was never nervous while observing this, just curious as to what the light could be and how odd it was to be there.
content.summary: Unkown flashes and lights in scott county

content.detailedDescription:
Over the past few monthes begining in summer of 2009, i have personally witenessed atleast 130+ sightings of 'black triangles' literally in my front yard. i realize that yeah, i should've reported each and every sighting, and i had planned too, but these reports take awhile to fill out and ive seen them so many times ive become used to seeing them. i'll look at them and laugh out loud and watch them until they fly away and put it aside. they always look and appear the same way; a very bright yellowish/white/amber light in the distance and once they reach a certian distance the light dissappears, leaving only an odd triangle craft that slowly hovers across the sky. the belly has a multitude of red, white and blue blinking lights in a strange almost eye-like pattern. the only noticible noise is a low humming or buzzing sound, kinda like a transformer or a power station. ive seen these things so many times that its honestly funny; ive seen one slowly crawling at an altitude of 200 ft. shining some strange searchlight into the pine trees across the road. ive seen 4 of them flying almost one after another across the night sky. ive even brought friends/family to my house to see them, most leaving saying "what the [cms/tg/pd] dude, why show me that, thats scary!?" and becoming firm believers. tonight was different . . .

 just like the first time i saw one, i was taking my dog outside to potty. immeditally i saw the bright light in the distance and recognized it as a triangle. i chained the dog up and as always i stayed to watch it fly over. but i was soon shocked (my cigarette litterally fell out of my mouth from awe) by how vastly different it was; firstly, the sheer size of it. atleast 300+ ft. across (typical triange i see is 90-100ft across)and the dazzeling lights which were vastly different from regular triangles. unlike other triangles, the bright light on the front didnt go off; it was clearly visable that it was a collection of 3 amber/white lights on the front. because it was pitch black outside i was unable to clearly define the outline of it, but i was almost directly under it with a small side view. tons of white, red, blue and one green light, some blinking rapidly others staying on. since i am limeted by my frugile human memory, i really couldnt describe the exact formation on the lights but there where a lot more than any typical triangle. 

two other huge differences where the clearly visable outline of some kind of 'cargo-bay' on the back, almost like the kind you'd find on a milatary jumbo jet used for dropping and loading cargo. there where 4 whitish lights of the corners of the 'cargo-bay' and a noticible slant to it. the other difference was . . . i want to say 'rabbit ear' protrutions from the sides of it. like if you took a regular black triangle and put two 'z' shaped wings on the top/side of it, thats what youd have. on the tips of them there were elongated ovals, like a small jet engine. the usual humming noise and soft roar probly caused by the massive displacment of air it caused. ive already ruled out the jumbo jet idea and the possibility of it being a v-22 ospery, simply because ive seen v-22's in action; theyre loud and not this big. altitude of 500-600ft, moving south-to-north.
content.summary: Surreal triangle, i'm still in shock...

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my backyard this evening and noticed how clear a night it was, with perhaps 12 stars visible which is a lot in the city. i noticed movement and saw a dimly visible star-like object which was moving slowly horizontally from the south-east toward due south. it was approximately 45 degrees up from the horizon. it appeared to be very high in altitude, so at first i thought it was a satellite. it disappeared with-in 4 seconds. i took a few steps (all the while keeping watch) to get a better view beyond a deciduous tree. about 3 seconds later, i saw the same star-like object just a little beyond where it had disappeared. i watched it for about 3 seconds continuing toward the south, but then it stopped and completely turned back toward the south-east. i was totally surprised. then for about 6 seconds it slowed several times and took an irregular course and then straightened again (still going toward the south-east) and then it disappeared in the general area it had disappeared before. i watched that area of the sky, and the rest of the sky visible from my yard for about another five minutes and didn't see it reappear.
it all seemed to happen slowly, yet it really only took a few seconds for the whole event to occur.
i went back outside about a half-hour later and the sky was cloud covered with no stars visible whatsoever. now several hours later it is completely clear again.
content.summary: Dimly visible white star-like object

content.detailedDescription: [this case entered by fi].  photos received by email.  awaiting return email from rp regarding interview./mcm

Occurred in october 2000.  parts taken: tit, udder, internal organs.  no blood, very defined excisions.

picture to follow.  witness beleives it was a cult but no visible evidence of human activity observed.

there has been ufo activity in the area over many years along with cattle rustling.
content.summary: Cattle mute

content.detailedDescription: On a clear and very cold morning in the late 1950's while delivering the tulsa daily times, i saw this unusual object which was plainly and clearly visible at tree top level, moving slowly, from my perspective, across the sky with no apparent deviation from it's south to north direction of travel. i did not recognize it as anything that i had ever seen before. it obviously was not a fixed wing aircraft nor even a blimp as there was no gondola and no noise what so ever coming from it. any body from that time era has seen plenty of blimps and i never for a second thought that this was one. this thing was something else. the object was egg shaped and was a spectacular blue color that seemed iridescent or sparkling. it was larger than the moon and smaller than my hand at arms length. it was also absolutely silent and left no trail behind it. i watched in utter amazement until it was out of sight. as soon as i got home i told my father about the u.F.O. i had seen. well, being 14 or 15 years old , i'm sure that he took my story in with a little skepticism but he listened to me politely as i poured my heart out and that was that. till the next morning when to both our surprise, dad told me that he had read of reported sightings of an (object)exactly matching my description as far away as tennessee. we both thought this was more than a coincidence and that it was the same u.F.O. that i had seen in tulsa the previous morning. today i'm 65 yrs. old and that memory is still with me as clear as the morning it happened.
content.summary: Brilliant sparkeling blue, silent, horiaziontal s. to n. direction, 10 to 15 degs. abv. horizion, somewhat larger than moon.

content.detailedDescription:
As my family and i were traveling west on us hwy 78 near monroe, toward loganville, ga., my wife and i saw a bright yellow/orange light traveling horizontal in a south-easterly direction. the vehicle suddenly made an abrupt turn downward, at about 70-80 degrees and dipped below the tree line. the object appeared to be traveling much faster than an ordinary aircraft and went downward at an angle that standard aircraft are not capable of. it was hard to judge the distance and size of the object but appeared to be about 1/2 mile away from us.

the objects speed, brightness and low level attracted my attention. i was startled by the object my wife asked me if we needed to call someone and i told her "no", we don't have enough information. she, at first, thought it was an airplane going down. when i explained to her that man-made aircraft cannot change direction at such an angle, she agreed.  we never saw the object again. the object appeared to have only one light, or be completely illuminated itself, but did not blink at all. i felt a little nervous after seeing the object but no other feelings were noted.
content.summary: Bright yellow/orange light

content.detailedDescription: What i have witnessed for the past week is not make believe i would not waste my time on here but no one in my family believed me so i feel that i need to tell what i seen. it all started when i was walking down my ally in green valley ranch denver co, when i saw a star that looked like it was kind of moving but then i realized it wasn't a star because it dimmed out and started to blink like a air plane with one light constant. it sort of hovered down and i followed it until i couldn't catch it. established i walked back to my home and told my sister which told me to grow up. then as i looked up out my living room window there were at least 5 lights in the sky all scattered and i thought airplanes or helicopters do not fly that close to each other. they kept hovering in different directions then coming back, but the main event happened on the same night i was walking down my ally again as i seen a really bright light in the sky again and i knew it wasn't a star and i walked closer to it and it wasn't moving at all i began to stare at it for about 30 seconds as it dimmed out and blinked red and a constant white light that kept dimming out and on not blinking. it came down and i could tell it was kind of coming in my direction close to 43rd and malaya a kind of busy street and it came down hovering not making any noise whats so ever and at this point i could kind of make out the fuger it looked like a triangle with three oval lights. as it was passing me by i seen a house it was about to go over with the family getting out of there car and in shock i screamed ufo but they couldn't here me. as i shouted it again at the top of my lungs it seemed to just dart off not making any noise at all. these weird lights are in the sky's of my neighborhood for the past week but to far to track and to low to be anything commercial. and the last sighting my father and sister witnessed it also. there were two red lights in the sky one over the other and one constantly red not moving and the one on top glowing like the moon red and dimming out doing it over and over again.
content.summary: Bright light not moving, came down hoverd over nieghbors house....

content.detailedDescription: When i saw the orb or "ovni", i was on a ridgeline above the local beaches, and the canyon i live in. i have seen this orb before and on occasion two of them in formation, so i keep a look out for them. they are really fascinating and i have been taking video of them for over a span of almost six months now.  the first sighting was in september of 2009. i in the loft of our barn and i looked out the window and saw a very bright light flying over our ranch. i yelled to my brother to look and then we both ran downstairs and outside to get a better look. i was awestruck, it must have been only 3-4 thousand feet off the ground, a brilliant blue and whitish orb with an aura around it. i could instantly tell this was no airplane or helicopter, it was also totally silent. i ran in to get my little hd sanyo camcorder and as i got back with it seconds later, i could not get it to turn on! i have used this camera a good deal an know how to work it, and the battery had just been fully charged. i believe it somehow jammed the electronics in it. any how i have canon xl1s and i have gotten some really great footage of these things. for some reason they always fade out or dim away after a few minutes. i have also sighted them in high orbits. they are definitely drawn to something here. it is also my belief that these are quite possibly coming from the depths of the ocean. they seem to come in waves, appearing for five to six nights in a row and then gone, they are always at different altitudes and headings. they generally have a steady course and heading, i have on occasion seen them dip and back track, both i caught on film.  the time my brother and  i observed two orbs in formation (also from a ridgeline facing the ocean) they flew right over us perhaps at 8-9,000 ft. they were more of an amber color. it was a rather ominous feeling when they were right above us, then they shot straight up into space-fading out. i have a freeze frame i took off  a video with the xl1s where the orb flies by a airplane. i zoomed in on it and enhanced some of the color tones. it is some what pixilated but you get can see what it is. ill be keeping my eyes open here on the west coast =)
content.summary: Bright star object came in off the coast at a pretty low altitude,

content.detailedDescription: I was starting my night watch shift sitting in my car. my care was facing west. i looked to the horizon and saw an amazing formation of bright red lights which were rising from the horizon. the formation was so big that i could not cover them all with my hand. the formation took up about a third of all my vision. i put my jacket on and grabbed my binoculars then got out of my car to get a better look. i propped the binoculars on a fire hydrant that was next to my car in order to steady the view. i saw a few of them close up with the binoculars. all i could make out was some sort of very intense bright red orb shape. i then started walking down jr drive towards the lights to see if i could tell how far they were from my location. my perspective never changed so i assume the formation was very very far away. from the right side to the left it must have been a 50 mile spread. it was in a busy part of town so there must be hundreds of people who saw it. i had no camera with me but made a drawing of the formation which i will make available.
content.summary: Symmetrical formation of  8 to 10 red lights

content.detailedDescription: I was stationed at bagram ab during most of 2009. on or about may 15, 2009; i was enjoying a night off. i had stepped out of my b-hut for a cigarette and noticed several red colored lights around the mountains surrounding the base. one light in particular appeared to be an orb and was hovering over the sw end of the base. this light was not like any aircraft light that operates in the area. most of the aircraft that are coming in at night do not have any lights on to prevent insurgents from attacking them during landing. the sw light moved back in forth in a slow motion, but also appeared to hover from time to time. another light located to the se hovered over a mountain pass at an altitude of about 25-30k feet. the third light was over the mountains just to the e of the base. i did see a pair of f-15s go up and begin patrols, but made no effort to intercept the lights. a kiowa helicopter was also flying around, but this was more likely as part of the base's standard force protection than in relation to the lights. these lights remained until just before sunrise, but had not lost any visibility like a star would as sunrise began. i did not see how the lights left the area as i had returned to my quarters. i know other soldiers saw them and wondered what they were from discussions at my office as well as the chow hall.
content.summary: Multiple lights over bagram ab, af.

content.detailedDescription: Basically the triangle object , and the large object were slowly moving in a east by south east direction. the small object would take off fast for a short distance , stop on a dime and move sharply to my left, and then stop again to a dead stop. then it would move for 15-20 minutes . i went inside to finish working on a furnace. when i came back out. they were still there but farther away. then i spotted out of the corner of my eye another small object darting around like the first one. i wear glasses so i can focus but the area of the sky i was watching looked a little out of focus ,and there maybe was fog in the air up high , but maybe not. it was very dark in the sky other than the lights from the objects which were very clear but in the middle it looked blurry.Never seen any ufo's before in my life so maybe was stars. would stars move in the sky 2-4 miles away in about 20-30 minutes ? the area i seen the possible objects was above darbydale ohio off norton rd. around 5100 norton rd.I was done working and i was getting cold. the stars just didn't look right to me , too many clustered together in one area, then spread out over the rest of the sky that i was looking at. hopefully someone else seen this also. if not then i probably wasn't seeing what i did. that fast moving object i definitly saw. so thats it.
content.summary: One triangle object, one large object, one small object.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in sutton, ak. in the front yard trying to take pictures of the moon. i am no photographer and only have a cannon power shot a590. it was on the default settings but i had moved the dial to "night scene" i took several pictures over the course of an hour. i didn't hear or see anything out of the ordinary while i was outside. i also had binoculars and did not see this object when looking through them and i think i would of noticed it. i'm sure i would of been very excited to see it actually. i saw the 2 stars when i was looking through the camera but i did not see this. anyway the first picture i took also included this round thing above the moon. maybe it was something on the lens? but it didn't show up on any of the other pictures and at no time while i was out side did i clean the lens. i was hoping you might be able to tell me what it is, and if not, will then you have another picture of something unidentified to add to your collection. thanks for all you do.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the moon.

content.detailedDescription: Outside on the deck having a cigarette i noticed a bright seemingly flashing light on the horizon through the trees, we looked at it through binoculars and could definitely make out multiple colored lights around a super bright white light.  it was close to the tree line so we thought it was some type of rescue or search helicopter, we watched it over the course of two hours as it slowly and steadily rose in the sky but remaining just as bright and seemingly motionless.
content.summary: Super bright star like object with flashing colors

content.detailedDescription:
I'm pretty sure this was in 1984 when i was just 12 years old. it was about mid summer, but i can't remember the date. it was quite a while ago. back then, i lived in howell, mi.

i was a clear night, with only a few wispy clouds in the sky, and the moon was almost full. it was a perfect night look look up, and i was always fascinated with the night sky. i knew that by the time i was an adult, we would be up there with our flying cars, commuting back home to mars from an honest day's work here on earth. well... that's what was supposed to happen, right?

santa, i think he went by the name "dad," around that time, had given me a telescope for christmas. it was the best gift ever, or maybe second to the jetfire tranforming robot that i found under the tree as well. 

it was around nine, and the sun had just set with still a bit of orange on the horizon. i had set up the telescope in the five-acre field between my home, and the home of my best friend, ricky, then went to his place to have him join me for a little moongazing.

i knocked on the window outside his bedroom, but there was no answer. so, i climbed, like we did, to the balcony of the upper floor to see if anyone was home. it's a good thing we lived in the woods and they were used to monkeys climbing on houses, i guess.

ricky's mom came out and told me that he had left with his father to pennsylvania to visit family, and wouldn't be back for a couple of weeks. so, we ended up talking for a few minutes and then i caught something from the corner of my eye in the sky to the north.

maybe one degree south of the treeline from the perspective of the balcony of her home, i saw 12 to 16 neon orange v shapes. they seemed to be substantial, because as they moved they would block out stars that they would pass under. i looked at ricky's mom to bring it to her attention, but she was already staring up at this display. 

it was a shock at first, and we watch with interest for 20 minutes according to her watch. what we witnessed were these v shapes assembling to two locations in the sky, pointing inward, and then joining to form two discs, like slices of a pizza. the assembly farthest to the north had merged without trouble, and simply hovered in the sky without sound, and perfectly still. the grouping to the south came together for the most part, but one of the vehicles was moving awkwardly and seemed to be having difficulty joining with the other craft. and this is what we were watching, and discussing the entire time.

after that 20 minutes, i had asked her if she had a camera. we simply didn't have the presence of mind to consider a camera at the time. who would want to go into the house and miss a moment of this anyway? she said she had no film for it, but after a while, decided to go inside and look for some. 

i stayed there on the balcony and watched, until she returned. she said that she had no film, and then asked me where they had gone. i looked from her to the sky, and they were gone. just like that. the entire display lasted maybe a half hour, then was gone the moment i looked away at my friend's mom!

it was an amazing night. after talking for a little while about what we had seen, i went back home. my mother was irritated, and informed me that it was midnight. she told me that she went to get me, but i had just left my telescope out and was nowhere around it. i thought that was impossible. there was no way. i could not have been out for more than an hour, being generous. there was just no way i was gone that long.

ever since then, there are other things. dreams.. curiosities.. i can't be certain, but i think somehow, i know how those things work. i know something else, too. something rather useful. well... i guess it's all moot. who is going to believe a nobody like me? my own wife never believed me! and this is not my only sighting. and i'll never have the money to explore the information that's been wedged somewhere in my mind. but if i could, this world would be forever changed. i wish i could.

but i can tell you this. difference waves. from the smallest particle, to the workings of the brain, to the mystery of consciousness. it's all a highly complex orchestra of difference waves. even space itself. all you need to transmute anything from one form to another is the difference image of the result you're looking for. i guess this is why thought affects things in reality to some degree. the brain is a difference wave processor, not the digital device that medicine compares it to. science doesn't realize this yet. so they slam particles into each other with the effect of a musician beating his guitar against a wall, and consider everything in the universe in terms of ones and zeroes. but it's neither a one nor a zero, yet also both, as well as the infinity in between.

all images exist simultaneously. all possibilities are present. and we can't understand why people have such widely varying world views. it's because we're all seeing something different, and trying our best to come to a consensus that we can call reality. unfortunately, violence and hatred seems to be our tool of choice.

maybe i was supposed to act. maybe i was given a gift and squandered it. if so, i apologize to all of you.

hm... but maybe now is the time....

maybe i will teleport that water molecule someday soon.
content.summary: Multiple vehicles merging to form larger vehicles.

content.detailedDescription: Just 40 minutes ago saw in the sky a large organish bright light traveling ne. i thought it was the iss, but from the reports iss is not in this orbit area??? please somebody debunk this for me?? this thing was huge! i saw a plane going the opposite direction and it was just a dot compared to this. also it lasted about 2 minutes then quickly faded out. i have seen the iss before and it was sort of in the same orbit, but did not fade out like this thing did! also, it looked like a smaller object left from it in the west direction, but could have been a small satellite coincidently passing at the same time....Would like to verify that!
content.summary: Large orange bright light..I thought it was iss (iss is not in this location)

content.detailedDescription: For two nights in a row off the lake michigan shore we observed a stationary star like object blinking white, red and green lights.  the first night there was one object, tonight three in a triangle shape.  they were there several hours and seemed to just float in the air.  very unusual, brighter than a star and definite colors.
content.summary: Red/white/green blinking stationary lights over lake michigan in triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i-169 from about 5 miles north of milaca when i noticed an odd bright white light in the sky probably somewhere over princeton off in the distance.  it was up at an altitude that it could have been a jet however there was no jet stream and it is in the single digits degrees farenheit.   it then appeared to turn and the light was no longer shining in my direction but i could see a craft of some sorts it was at a distance that the shape was undistinguishable, then all of a sudden i could no longer see it as if it just zoomed off, however there was no sign of a jet stream and it disappeard very suddenly.  five minutes later i see a jet heading in the direction the craft appeard to take off in and another five minutes later another jet heading in the same direction.
content.summary: Bright light hovering that appeared to turn and disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work heading south on state route 101 in santa clara county, california. i worked in santa clara up 'till 5:30 pm and then head home to san jose, california. traffic was slow in sr 101, as usual, and as i was approaching the area of the san jose international airport, i was watching this "bright light" on my left side(coming from the east) and notice that it was rather a little brighter that the others i've seen when aircraft are preparing to land. it wasn't dark yet but yes, the sun was getting ready to set. a few minutes have passed and it seems the aircraft is taking it's "sweet time" to land. just when the traffic started to move again and paid attention to my driving instead of the "bright light", i lost eye contact of this object for a while. then as the traffic slowed down again and me searching for this object, i looked up to look for the object at about 10:00 position, i saw this "semi-disk" shaped object with multi colored lights (could be windows) around it. "semi-disk" because i only saw one side of it because i think it was a little tilted on my vantage point.

i looked around to see if any other motorist saw the object but looks like none of them saw it except me.  i said to myself to pull over (i was on the fast lane and i could have easily pulled over) and take a better look...But i said nah, i'm probably just seeing things from the long day at work.

as i was watching the news on tv while having dinner, the late mr. van amberg of abc news reported that a ufo was sighted in the bay area at around 6:00 pm to 6:30 pm and was described as a bright light. the object was observed for more than half an hour and traversed a path from east to west direction.

wow!  i missed that completely! my apologies for being a "doubting thomas".
content.summary: I saw a bright light and around it are multicolored lights but it tilted a little 'cause i just one side of it..

content.detailedDescription:
I was in newtown, pa working.  i was on manor rd. at 1:32am.It was a totally clear night.  i had just looked at the clock when ahead of me in the sky was a row of lights that looked strange, so i stopped.  they were just hovering about 50ft. above the trees and a few hundred feet ahead of me.  it was totally silent.  i got out to get a better look.  it started to bank right, very slowly.  all the lights faded as if it were going through a cloud, then 4 lights brightened. one on each wing tip and two, spaced, in the middle.  as it contined to bank, i saw a row of small red lights under the two center white lights and then a second row of small red lights on the belly.  i absolutely could not see the shape of the craft.  just blackness.  it contined to turn around until i could see the back.  i then saw red and white lights, this time in bars, flashing on and off like a laser light show. the configuration of those rear lights showed the back was a different shape.  like the rudder of a plane.  it was going away, but still clear in the sky and i reached for the door handle of my van, glanced back up, and it was just gone.        
   when i first saw it and noticed it was silent, i thought of stealths.  i went to an air show once and saw a stealth, but this didn't look like that.  as i was looking at the front, i was reminded of a manta ray, or skate.
    i was surprised and a little uneasy, but it didn't do anything, just went away, so i went back to work.  when i spoke with co-workers, one suggested it was some kind of upgraded stealth.  ok, but we're not near a military base, and a stealth wouldn't have a laser light show on the back.
    i don't know what it was.
    two hours after i saw this, four choppers, in formation, were seen by me and a co-worker.  as they got to newtown, they split up. i could see them, singly, as i contined to work, for about another hour.
content.summary: A row of lights first hovering, then slowly banked just above tree level.  then went away from me and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We were (7) all out side around 9:30am this morning and one of us looked up in the sky and noticed an object. we all than focused on the object and it continued to remain in the same location for a span of 30 minutes. one from our party thought they were possibly be a balloon but it was to high up and was stationary. when a second object appeared just a few hundred yards to the right of the first object and watched the two for about 5 minutes when the second object disappeared out of sight. after around 25 minutes went by when i tried to focus with a pair of high powered binoculars and in doing so i noticed it was perfectly round in shape with a yellowish metalic coloration. after 30 minutes the object disappeared and we were unable to relocate the object.
content.summary: Yellowish white sphere

content.detailedDescription: I looked out of front window at the snow on the ground, i noticed in front of me three white objects joined together on top of each other. i went to back of window and saw three object, but more solid, with windows facing me also on top of each other. very strange.I wasn't sleeping and before this happenned i awoke sweating. i was up all night.
content.summary: There were three connected white, and then i saw again three looked different in back of house,

content.detailedDescription:
It was may 30, 2008, when my wife and i were driving back home after eating at a restaurant downtown. we were on i-10 eastbound, driving 
70-ish, in abnormally non-existent traffic for a friday night. when we were a couple of miles past the davis hgwy interchange, i noticed a light twin airplane passing overhead and to my left, going south, low in altitude (200-300 ft) presumably for landing (as we could see landing lights and gear extended). this isn't unusual, the traffic patterns frequently pass over for that particular runway. but, a bright ring of 10 or more amber lights behind/beside the plane startled me, thinking someone just launched a ring-shaped fireworks display in dangerously close proximity to this landing plane. as the plane continued, apparently ignorant of these lights, the  mystery lights seemed to shut off, and disappear rather quickly. i quickly asked my wife if she had seen these "fireworks," as she was in the front passenger seat of our jeep wrangler. she said she had not, but as i started to describe the lights as we continued down the road, they reappeared, as if they "turned on" with a switch, still to my left, above the trees, but at least 1000-2000ft from where i saw it last. it seemed as though whatever it was, it was moving at least 80+ mph, since it reappeared slightly ahead of us, and we were going e @ 70 mph. my wife saw it this time, and agreed it did look like fireworks (in shape and color), only to watch it disappear seconds later again, instantly. we were now a little confused, knowing it was not a plane, blimp, flares, or a mobile fireworks platform. as we continued east, and are struggling to say anything further, it reappears again, instantly, and it is now apparent that these lights must be fixed to a solid object, and are flashing at an interval of a couple seconds on (all of them), and then off simultaneously for a couple seconds. it was apparently tracking to the east-south-east, heading towards the bay and beyond. as the interstate curves to the north approaching scenic hgwy, the object crossed over the lanes, and because of its altitude and direction, my wife thought it would hit the ramada inn. it passed over though, still blinking its amber lights rhythmically, and we followed it on the off-ramp to scenic highway. when we got to the traffic light, my wife frantically pleaded that we go south on scenic and follow it. i just sat and stared as it continued east-southeast over the bay, apparently unable to speak or drive, or follow my wife's instructions. she asked me several more times, and i instead turned north to go home. i don't know why i didn't follow it, i wished that i had, but something majorly psycological was computing in my brain, and refusing to accept what we knew we just saw. i had never seen a ufo before, but my life has not been the same since. i just wish they'd come back again.
content.summary: Disk w/ flashing amber lights, passing overhead

content.detailedDescription: It was new years eve and i was getting ready to go to work (i drive a public hire taxi in belfast) and had to go to the petrol station to get petrol as it shut at 2100. driving back into my street i noticed a red/orange coloured light in the sky quite near jupiter in sky as it was a very clear cold night, i called my wife out to look at it as i thought it was so strange looking,she came out and we began to observe the object which after a few mins and dicussussions of what it might be as at first i thought it may be an airplane as we live under the flight paths of both the george best airport and belfast international which i discounted because of the colour of the object and no flashing navigation lights, it suddenly started to rise very quickly into the night sky, i turned to my wife who was still looking at the quickly deminishing object and missed the best bit because when i took my eyes off the object my wife seen it shoot off at a fantastic speed to the north/west.Could it also be noted that this is now the third sighting of these kind of lights in the sky in the last 2 months, the first a single light orange coloured orb on holloween night and 2 weeks later multiple lights in a formation of sorts totaling 6 again orange coloured orbs.
content.summary: Orange/red star like object in sky which my wife had noticed first,i came back from shop and noticed myself it rose up very quickly then shot off at a fantastic speed to the north/west

content.detailedDescription: The sky at south-west was clear when i looked at it. a bright yellow star-like moving object with constant speed went from south-west towards north-east. it disappeared into the clouds half a minute later. the direction of travel was also constant as the speed.
content.summary: The sky was clear when i looked at it. a bright yellow star-like moving object with constant speed went from south-west towards north-east.

content.detailedDescription:
Le 19 septembre 2009, avec un ami nous tentons une expdition de rencontre du cinquime type, c'est-a-dire une tentative de contact avec les extraterrestres.

nous allons sur un site isol afin de tenter le contact.

aprs le coucher du soleil, se lve dans le ciel un trs brillante lumire blanche... intrigus, nous nous interrogeons sur la nature du phnomne.

la lumire s'lve graduellement dans le ciel et reste quelques heures brillante dans le ciel toil.

le lendemain, je regarde sur youtube et je constate qu'il y a deux reportages du cnn et fox concernant cette lumire.

je trouve aussi des tmoins qui ont photographi la lumire a partir du maine.

la rponse de la nasa est qu'il s'agit d'une fuse exprimentale.
cependant, je doute de cette explication puisque la lumire est demeure plus de 4 heures dans le ciel, et que selon mes estimations la lumire ne provenait pas en direction de virginie, mais plutt de l'ocan atlantique.

voici un lien youtube pour visionner le reportage sur fox news....
a vous de juger, ovni ou fuse exprimentale?

ufo seen over eastern coast sept 19, 2009
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=5v3kov7ibvy
content.summary: Un croissant lumineux avec un cne de lumire blanche

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern, you may contact me regarding my personal knowledge of the navys deep sea ufo / uso 1961 deep sea salvage attempt in the south pacific, during operation dominic-an unprecedented series of atmospheric nuclear tests.  
after 48 year , i like many ex-military service personnel are  coming out of the wood work to share their    ufo/uso experiences  this is mine. i am hoping it will fill in and add to the early 1960s ufo/uso  sightings not reported in the area of the south pacific.  what is amazing to me after all these years i still get a visit from one or two unknown strangers suggesting i think twice before going public with what i know about what i witnessed back in 1961/1962 while serving onboard a us naval escort destroyer.
it was during one of our ships many sea operations back in 1962- patrolling restricted sea and air space. while serving onboard a us navy destroyer  radar picket ship, i and a dozen other selected crew members was ordered on deck to observe a crippled boggy or ufo about to crash into the sea, not far from our ships location.  later, i was to learn the subject ufo was accidently struck down by a powerful high altitude atomic test missile.
years later in 19--, while stationed at guantanamo bay cuba i met a chief navy diver who said he was going to write a book about his involvement and a secret navy attempt to extract a ufo from the bottom of the ocean floor in 1962 during operation dominic. i was shocked to learn it was the exact same ufo/uso i witnessed on its way to the sea bottom.  
about week later, after our conversation on the ufo topic the master chief diver died under strange circumstances- a day before his 30 year retirement in the navy. 
i have  a  lot more  information on the subject  when it comes to ufo and uso human connection, on a personal level.  if you want to learn more-  i will share documents and a picture taken  by a navy pilot in 1961,  of a ufo near the  exact  same ufo crash site in the south pacific.
content.summary: About 200 yards long- taveling parralle to the horizon approx. 2500 feet above sea level.

content.detailedDescription: There is a strange over head sound, then whithin 30 seconds,deep thundering under the house.Always followed by scratching and digging under and in the walls,then silence.Ps. the overhead sound can be felt thru the entire body ps. pink tipped crystals found on ground recently.
content.summary: Under the house digging,
